name: Misha Gusev
about:
Experienced full-stack developer with a focus on backend development.
Specialized in creating scalable REST APIs using FastAPI, microservices, developing modern web applications with Vue.js and designing databases with SQLAlchemy.
Have extensive experience in creating telegram bots with multi-language support and user-friendly interfaces.
Expert in web layout, including creating custom UI.
Constantly developing in the field of information technology, passionately interested in new frameworks and ready to apply my knowledge in complex projects.

news_autopost.company: Telegram Bot for News Distribution Automation
tasks: Developed a multifunctional telegram bot for automatic news parsing from multiple sources in the logistics industry with categorization by transport, delivery and customs, and publishing them in Telegram channels
Integrated a unique image generation system for posts through a custom API for working with Midjourney
Created a scalable architecture for processing large volumes of content in real time
Developed an intelligent telegram bot for comprehensive analysis of Wildberries product reviews
Implemented ChatGPT for identifying problematic products, fake reviews and analyzing consumer preferences
Created convenient review output in table format with multiple formats (CSV, XLSX) for user convenience
Created a universal monitoring system for tracking messages in public and private Telegram groups
Implemented an intelligent filtering system with keyword and category support
Developed an intuitive interface with quick navigation to original messages
Developed a full-featured application with backend and frontend for displaying VALORANT player statistics on streams
Created a scalable integration system with key platforms: Twitch, YouTube, Discord, Kick and Spotify
Developed an interactive chat bot to increase audience engagement
Provided technical support for multiple streamers and optimized system performance
Developed an intelligent moderation system that reduced server spam by 90%
Created an intuitive navigation system with modern responsive design
Implemented a suite of entertainment and utility services to improve user experience
